description: LA Lakers star had one of his most impactful games of the season to propel his side to a comeback win against Denver.
title: Luka Doncic records triple-double as Lakers rally past Nuggets

description: Bangladesh given one day to decide whether it will play in India or face forfeiture, allowing Scotland to replace it.
title: ICC won’t relocate Bangladesh’s T20 World Cup games from India

description: Top-ranked Carlos Alcaraz and Aryna Sabalenka win in straight sets in third round action at Melbourne Park.
title: Alcaraz, Sabalenka cruise into Australian Open third round

description: War of words between Trump and Iranian officials escalates as Washington moves aircraft carrier.
title: US, Iran exchange threats of broadscale war in latest sabre rattling
